DIPPER: One who, or that which, dips (immerses something, or itself, into a liquid).
FOOT: A biological structure found in many animals that is used for locomotion and that is frequently a separate organ at the terminal part of the leg.
LEAGUE: A group or association of cooperating members.
RASCALS: A 7-letter word related to channel surfing.
SPOON: An implement for eating or serving; a scooped utensil whose long handle is straight, in contrast to a ladle.
